de.hsa.jam.audio.collector
Class NoteCollectorWorker

java.lang.Object
  de.hsa.jam.audio.collector.NoteCollectorWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class NoteCollectorWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class implements the pipeline.
First read a buffer from the queue.
Then detect pitch, collect, pre-process and decide.

Author:
Michael Wager

Constructor Detail

NoteCollectorWorker

public NoteCollectorWorker(Model model,
                           AudioBufferQueue queue,
                           float audioSampleRate,
                           int bufferSize,
                           int overlap,
                           int bpm,
                           java.lang.String PDA)
Model instantiates a new collectorWorker for each melody.

Parameters:
model - - get Model to set ModelProperties and to communicate with view
queue - - the AudioBufferQueue
audioSampleRate - - samplerate
bufferSize - - buffersize in samples
overlap - - bufferoverlap in samples
bpm - - beats per minute of the recording
PDA - - which pitch detection algorithm to use: "YIN" or "MPM"
